speak_paper.name: 【APP专项测试】--所有题型打分测试
speak_paper.full_name: 【APP专项测试】--所有题型打分测试

questions.body: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer is a great book. It is more than an adventure story. Mark Twain wrote it in 1876. It describes people's lives in the southern states of America at that time. It tells how young people grow, how people love each other and how bad people pay for their actions. It is written in everyday English, and the dialogues sound especially real. Today, it is still read and loved by people all over the world, and it is thought to be one of the greatest American stories.
answer: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer is a great book. It is more than an adventure story. Mark Twain wrote it in 1876. It describes people's lives in the southern states of America at that time. It tells how young people grow, how people love each other and how bad people pay for their actions. It is written in everyday English, and the dialogues sound especially real. Today, it is still read and loved by people all over the world, and it is thought to be one of the greatest American stories.

groups.title: (二) 根据英语/汉语提示进行表达

questions.body: 我喜欢读书，每周读两次书。在我读过的故事中，我最喜欢《愚公移山》。我第一次读它时候是十岁。它讲述了一个叫愚公的老人要搬动他房屋附近的山的故事。我被这个故事深深地打动了。有些人可能认为愚公是愚蠢的，因为他选择了一种愚蠢的方式。但我不这么认为。从这个故事中，我们学到了如果我们努力工作，一切都是可能的。
answer: I love reading and I read books twice a week. Among the stories that I have read, I like Yu Gong Moves the Mountains best. I first read it when I was ten years old. It tells about an old man named Yu Gong and he wants to move the mountain near his house. I was deeply affected by this story. Some people might think Yu Gong was stupid because he chose a foolish way. But I didn't think so. From the story, I learn that everything is possible if we work hard.@@I like reading and I read books twice a week. Among the stories that I have read, my favorite is Yu Gong Moves the Mountains. The first time I read it was many years ago. The story describes an old man named Yu Gong and he wants to move the mountain nearby. I was deeply touched  by this story. Some people might think he was really stupid because he would never move the mountains away. But I didn't agree with them. From the story, I learn that everything is possible if we work hard.

body_urls.content: I love reading and I read books twice a week. Among the stories that I have read, I like Yu Gong Moves the Mountains best. I first read it when I was ten years old. It tells about an old man named Yu Gong and he wants to move the mountain near his house. I was deeply affected by this story. Some people might think Yu Gong was stupid because he chose a foolish way. But I didn't think so. From the story, I learn that everything is possible if we work hard.
body_urls.name: ZB-JH7U06-F1.mp3

directions_urls.name: 67b171e46e2e484d862a.mp3
directions_urls.content: 你将听到一篇英文短文，短文听两遍，并在屏幕上看到该短文的汉语要点提示。在听完短文并做60秒钟准备后，请根据听到的内容和屏幕提示进行复述，复述内容需包含所有要点。录音时间为90秒钟。

questions.directions: 你将听到一篇英文短文，短文听两遍，并在屏幕上看到该短文的汉语要点提示。在听完短文并做60秒钟准备后，请根据听到的内容和屏幕提示进行复述，复述内容需包含所有要点。录音时间为90秒钟。

groups.title: (三) 听短文并根据要点复述

questions.body:
1) When is Bob going to graduate?

2) What did Mr Smith teach?

3) What did Mr Smith ask students to do on the first day?

4) Why did Bob make up his mind to study hard?

5) When did Bob go to the English corner every week?

6) What did Bob want to be in the future?
answer: My name is Bob. I am going to graduate from middle school next week. I still remember my first day of middle school. In Mr Smith's English class, he asked us to introduce ourselves in English. But my English was so poor that I couldn't say a complete sentence. I was very embarrassed. But he encouraged me instead of getting angry. So I made up my mind to study English well. I listened carefully in class and went to the English corner every Friday. My English has improved a lot. In the future, I want to become an English teacher like Mr Smith.@@I am Bob. I will graduate from middle school next week. My first day of middle school was unforgettable for me. Mr Smith is an English teacher. In his class, he asked us to make an English self-introduction. But my English was very poor and I couldn't say a complete sentence. Mr Smith didn't get angry but encouraged me. Therefore, I made up my mind to study English well. After that, I listened very carefully in class. I also went to the English corner every Friday. My English has improved a lot. I want to be an English teacher in the future.

body_urls.name: WH-JH7U10-C1.mp3
body_urls.content: My name is Bob. I am going to graduate from middle school next week. I still remember my first day of middle school. In Mr Smith's English class, he asked us to introduce ourselves in English. But my English was so poor that I couldn't say a complete sentence. I was very embarrassed. But he encouraged me instead of getting angry. So I made up my mind to study English well. I listened carefully in class and went to the English corner every Friday. My English has improved a lot. In the future, I want to become an English teacher like Mr Smith.

answer: Because a student uses his phone in class.@@Because a student answers his phone in class.@@A student uses his phone in class.@@A student answers his phone in class.@@Because a boy uses his phone in class.@@Because a boy answers his phone in class.@@A boy uses his phone in class.@@A boy answers his phone in class.

groups.title: (五) 听短对话后口头回答问题

answer: A student.@@He is a student.@@He's a student.@@He is a student now.@@He's a student now.@@Li Ming is a student.@@Li Ming is a student now.

body_urls.name: WH-JH7U10-B4.mp3
body_urls.content:
W: What's your plan after graduation, Li Ming?

M: Well, my dad wants me to be a doctor, but I prefer to be a painter.

groups.title: (六) 听长对话后口头回答问题

body_urls.content:
W: How do you feel about coming to China, Jerry?

M: Well, at first I felt lonely, because I didn't have any friends here. Also, speaking Chinese made me feel nervous.

W: How is it going now?

M: Oh, now I have made some new friends. They often teach me Chinese. I can speak Chinese well. I'm quite confident when I speak Chinese now.

W: So, I think you like China now, yes?

M: Of course.
body_urls.name: ZB-JH7U06-E1.mp3

directions_urls.name: 5318c4e8ec584a16af49.mp3
directions_urls.content: 你将听到一段英文对话，对话听两遍。在听完对话并做20秒钟准备后，请根据听到的内容和屏幕提示，用英语回答问题。每小题的作答时间为15秒钟。在听到提示音后，进入下一小题。

questions.directions: 你将听到一段英文对话，对话听两遍。在听完对话并做20秒钟准备后，请根据听到的内容和屏幕提示，用英语回答问题。每小题的作答时间为15秒钟。在听到提示音后，进入下一小题。

subs.body: Why did Jerry feel lonely at first?
answer: Because he didn't have any friends here.@@Because Jerry didn't have any friends here.@@He didn't have any friends here.@@Jerry didn't have any friends here.@@Because he didn't have any friends in china.@@Because Jerry didn't have any friends in China.@@He didn't have any friends in.@@Jerry didn't have any friends in China.
Speaking Chinese made him feel nervous.@@Speaking Chinese made him nervous.@@Speaking Chinese.

subs.body: How does he feel when he speaks Chinese now?
answer: He feels quite confident when he speaks Chinese now.@@He's quite confident when he speaks Chinese now.@@He is quite confident when he speaks Chinese now.@@He is quite confident.@@He's quite confident.@@He feels quite confident.@@Quite confident.@@Confident.@@He feels confident when he speaks Chinese now.@@He's confident when he speaks Chinese now.@@He is confident when he speaks Chinese now.@@He is confident.@@He's confident.@@He feels confident.
angry
schoolwork
interesting
proud
hobby

body_urls.content: My name is Peter. I'm a middle school student. My grades are not very good, and my parents are angry with me. I told them that I worked hard at school, but the problem is, I am just not good at schoolwork. My parents think I spend too much time playing basketball when I should be studying. It's true that I play lots of basketball because I think basketball is more interesting and it can help me relax after study. Now I'm in the school team and I am proud of that. But I will spend more time on my study and make a balance between my study and hobby.
body_urls.name: WF-JH6M05-B1调整速度.mp3

It's true that I play lots of basketball because I think basketball is more interesting and it can help me relax after study. Now I'm in the school team and I am proud of that. But I will spend more time on my study and make a balance between my study and hobby.@@My name is Peter. I'm a middle school student. I don't get good marks and my parents are angry with me. It's true, because I think basketball is interesting and it makes me relaxed after study. Now I'm in the school team and I am proud of that. groups.title: (八) 听后记录并朗读（潍坊）

questions.body: We have a large sports ground for football and tennis, where we can play both during and after school hours. After-school activities, such as sports clubs and language societies, are popular too. During the school year there are usually visits to museums and to camps for activities such as climbing and walking in the country. Last year a group of us even went to Japan. There are parties and a sports day, and school plays are really popular. Once a term, there is a parents' meeting, so our parents and teachers can talk about our progress.
answer: We have a large sports ground for football and tennis, where we can play both during and after school hours. After-school activities, such as sports clubs and language societies, are popular too. During the school year there are usually visits to museums and to camps for activities such as climbing and walking in the country. Last year a group of us even went to Japan. There are parties and a sports day, and school plays are really popular. Once a term, there is a parents' meeting, so our parents and teachers can talk about our progress.We have a large sports ground for football and tennis, where we can play both during and after school hours. groups.title: (十四) 听后选择(口头回答)

questions.body:
A. I hope to become a writer. 
B. I wish you success. 
C. Yes, I hope to take it.
answer: I hope to become a writer.

options: I'd like to have a cup of tea.
I'd like to go to New York.
